item.title: Foreword
item.description: How did we get here/Foreword Add Partner logo. Add a brief intro to the story of what the industry is dealing with: Follow these examples: 1. https://circleci.awsworkshop.io/010_introduction/10_foreword.html 1. https://harness.awsworkshop.io/010_introduction/10_foreword.html

item.title: The Challenge
item.description: The Problem What is Kong solving This is where you describe the use case/technical challenge that Kong is solving. Explain the importance of these issues Examples: https://harness.awsworkshop.io/010_introduction/12_problem_to_solve.html https://circleci.awsworkshop.io/010_introduction/12_problem_to_solve.html

item.title: What is Kong?
item.description: Some title about Kong Enabling Secure, Reliable, and Safe Deployments at Scale Talk about Kong!! Examples: https://armory.awsworkshop.io/010_introduction/14_partner.html https://harness.awsworkshop.io/010_introduction/14_harness.html

item.title: Workshop Prerequisites
item.description: Workshop Prerequisites There are a few prerequisite tasks you must perform before getting started on this workshop. These are: Access to an AWS account with proper permissions. A Cloud9 IDE Workspace Kong setup (add more detailed instructions here). In the next section, you will be instructed on how to configure all the prerequisite task stated above.
